DOC.brief_summary: This is a randomized clinical trial to investigate the efficacy of letrozole combined with metronomic oral cyclophosphamide in elderly metastasis breast cancer patients.
DOC.brief_title: Study in Letrozole Combined With Metronomic Oral Cyclophosphamide in Elderly Metastasis Breast Cancer Patients
